docs.title: 🚀 GitGenius
docs.text: Understand Git errors in plain English – instantly.

docs.title: 👋 Welcome to GitGenius CLI
docs.text:
Welcome to the documentation for GitGenius CLI, your intelligent command-line assistant that explains confusing Git errors.

GitGenius is a smart and simple CLI tool that explains Git errors in plain English and helps you fix them quickly.

GitGenius is your intelligent command-line assistant that explains confusing Git errors and helps you fix them — instantly.

docs.title: 🚀 Why GitGenius?
docs.text:
• 🔍 Decode cryptic Git errors
  • 💡 Suggests best fixes
  • ⚡ Works offline
  • 🧠 Understands complex Git messages
  • 🔄 Constant updates

docs.title: 📚 Explore
docs.text:
• 📦 Installation
  • 💻 Usage
  • 📖 Commands Reference
  • ✨ Features
  • ❓ FAQ
  • 🕒 Changelog

docs.title: v0.1.3
docs.text:
• ⚡ Improved CLI speed for large repos
  • 📦 Added --set-emoji and --no-emoji global flags
  • 🔧 Better branch detection
  • 🛠 Fixed minor parsing bugs in commit detection

docs.title: v0.1.2
docs.text:
• ✅ Added offline support
  • 🚀 Faster error parsing
  • 🧠 Smarter suggestions

docs.title: v0.1.1
docs.text:
• ✨ Initial PyPI release
  • 🔍 Git error detection
  • 💡 Suggestion engine

docs.title: 📖 Commands Reference
docs.text: ⚡ Command 📜 Description --git-version Show Git version --current-branch Show current branch --repo-status Show repo status --recent-commits [n] Show n latest commits --examples Show example Git errors --json Output as JSON --admin Open admin panel --no-emoji Disable emojis permanently --set-emoji Enable emojis permanently --version Show GitGenius version

docs.title: Q: Does it need internet?
docs.text: A: No, GitGenius works offline!

docs.title: Q: Can I contribute?
docs.text: A: Yes! Visit our GitHub Repo to start contributing.

docs.title: Q: Is it open source?
docs.text: A: 100% open source and MIT licensed.

docs.title: ✨ Features
docs.text:
• 🔍 Instant Git error explanation
  • 💡 Suggests best fix
  • 📤 Easy CLI tool with zero config
  • 🌐 Works offline
  • 🧠 Understands complex messages
  • ⚡ Fast & lightweight
  • 🔄 Continuous improvements and updates

docs.title: 🚀 Deploy to GitHub Pages
docs.text:
1. Initialize Git repo (if not yet):
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/selvaneyas/gitgenius-cli.git
  1. Install mkdocs-material:
pip install mkdocs-material
  1. Deploy:
mkdocs gh-deploy

Access it here:

https://selvaneyas.github.io/gitgenius-cli/

docs.title: 🐍 Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Python 3.7 or higher
  • pip

docs.title: 💡 Install using pip
docs.text: pip install gitgenius

docs.title: 🧪 Upgrade
docs.text: pip install --upgrade gitgenius

docs.title: 🧹 Uninstall
docs.text: pip uninstall gitgenius

docs.title: ⚡ Basic Command
docs.text: gitgenius "fatal: not a git repository"

docs.title: 🔍 Examples
docs.text: gitgenius "error: failed to push some refs"

docs.title: 💡 Tip
docs.text: Run gitgenius --help to view all supported commands and options.
